text: The Dead Pool is a 1988 American action thriller movie directed by Buddy Van Horn and is the fifth and final movie in the Dirty Harry series. It stars Clint Eastwood, Patricia Clarkson, Liam Neeson, Evan C. Kim, David Hunt, Michael Currie and was distributed by Warner Bros.. == Other websites == * * * Category:1988 action movies Category:1988 thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Buddy Van Horn
title: The Dead Pool
